1402900.name: Twilight Memoria
1402900.description:
Twilight Memoria: Sun and Moon is a nostalgic RPG about growing up in a seemingly quiet village, one that you soon discover is full of secrets. You play as two inseparable childhood friends: Rucifar Demien, the spirited son of a famous adventurer, and Luna Silver, a prodigy in alchemy.

Instead of idling away your days, you’ll help villagers, take on requests from the village chief, and uncover the strange mysteries unfolding around you. As Rucifar and Luna’s bond deepens, you’ll begin to explore the unfamiliar feelings of first love, a step into a new world of romance, friendship, and self-discovery.

Through heartfelt interactions, meaningful alchemy choices, and a story filled with warmth and wonder, Sun and Moon captures the spirit of childhood adventures, quiet acts of heroism, and the innocence of falling in love for the very first time.

Real-Time Turn-Based Combat

Battle monsters using an Active Time Battle system where every character, including enemies, acts on their own timer. Rucifar fights on the front lines while Luna supports from behind, healing, crafting bombs, and using items mid-battle. You’ll need quick thinking and teamwork to survive, especially since you're just two kids up against dangerous creatures.

Unpredictable Alchemy System

Recreate the joy of mixing wild potions as a kid, throwing in whatever you had and hoping for magic. Craft potions, bombs, and quest items using a flexible ingredient system where recipes only list types, like "Liquid" or "Leaf." It’s up to you whether you choose spring water… or monster blood. Every choice affects the outcome, making experimentation part of the adventure!

Quest-Based Village Life

Help your neighbors and prove your worth by completing requests from the village chief. From gathering materials to investigating strange happenings, each quest deepens your connection to the community.

A Story of Friendship and First Love

Grow alongside Rucifar and Luna as they support each other, challenge expectations, and experience the confusing thrill of first love. Strengthen their bond through shared adventures, meaningful choices, and quiet moments.
